metadata.description: Compliance – If the app was launched at least this many times in the last 30, ask for business justification
Compliance – If the app is shared with this many or more users, ask for business justification
Compliance – If the app is shared with this many or more groups, ask for business justification
Compliance – If the chatbot is launched this many or more times, ask for business justification
Compliance – If an app is broadly shared and was last published this many days ago or older, then they are asked to publish to stay compliant
Compliance – LEAVE EMPTY ON IMPORT.  URL to Developer Compliance Center Canvas App.
Inventory - Yes by default. Set to No if you are creating a dev type envt. This will allow some flows to set target users to the admin instead of resource owners
Inventory - Set to Yes if you want to Exclude the Default environment from the Admin | Compliance Details request flow
Inventory - CoE Admin eMail. Email address used in flows to send notifications to admins; this should be either your email address or a distribution list
Inventory - REQUIRED. Environment, including geographic location, for Power Automate - Ex for commercial: https://flow.microsoft.com/manage/environments/

parameters.$filter:
admin_excusefromcomplianceflow ne true and admin_environmentdeleted
ne true

no-op_-_asked_to_ignore_Default.inputs: No-op. Ignore default if 'Exclude Default environment from Compliance Request flows' is true

parameters.$select: admin_body, admin_cc, admin_replyto, admin_sendonbehalf, admin_subject, admin_importance

body.text_1:
@{outputs('Get_a_row_by_ID_2')?['body/admin_body']} Developer Compliance Center

App Details

Display Name: @{items('Apply_to_each_envt_App')?['admin_displayname']}

Environment:@{items('Apply_to_each_envt_App')?['admin_appenvironment/admin_displayname']}

REASSIGNED TO ADMIN
@{outputs('Get_a_row_by_ID_2')?['body/admin_body']} Developer Compliance Center

App Details

Display Name: @{items('Apply_to_each_envt_App')?['admin_displayname']}

Environment:@{items('Apply_to_each_envt_App')?['admin_appenvironment/admin_displayname']}

No-op,_not_broadly_used_or_shared.inputs: No-op, not broadly used or shared

Set_App_Launches_from_PowerApps_table.description: Number of sessions in the past 30 days are populated in this field from BYODL

parameters.$filter: admin_appid eq '@{items('Apply_to_each_envt_App')?['admin_appid']}' and admin_creationtime gt @{addDays(utcNow(), -30)} and admin_operation eq 'LaunchPowerApp'

If_App_Launches_are_0,_get_data_from_Aud.description: If Inventory is not via BYODL but via sync flows, get app launches from Audit Log instead

parameters.$filter: admin_powerappstype eq 597910000 and _admin_appowner_value ne null and admin_appdeleted ne true and admin_appownerdisplayname ne 'SYSTEM' and _admin_appenvironment_value  eq '@{items('Apply_to_each_envt')?['admin_environmentid']}' and admin_appexcusedfromcompliance ne true

admin_PVAOwner/admin_displayname ne 'SYSTEM' and admin_pvadeleted ne true and _admin_pvaenvironment_value eq '@{items('Apply_to_each_envt')?['admin_environmentid']}' and admin_chatbotexcusedfromcompliance ne true

equals: @parameters('Exclude Default environment from Compliance Request flows (admin_ExcludeDefault)')

parameters.item/admin_flowinstanceurl: @concat(parameters('Power Automate Environment Variable (admin_PowerAutomateEnvironmentVariable)'), workflow()?['tags']['environmentName'], '/flows/', workflow()?['name'], '/runs/', workflow()?['run']['name'])

Catch_-_not_ready_to_take_last_run_date.inputs: Catch - not ready to take last run date
